title: Collaborative Learning Program for Strengthening Foundational Mathematics Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A program for managers aiming to master basic mathematical concepts (decimals, ratios, percentages) essential for workplace decision-making.

learning_goals: Achieve over 90% proficiency in converting between decimals, ratios, and percentages through real-world scenario-based problems
Improve team communication efficiency by 80% while solving complex mathematical problems through collaborative learning activities

Learners will present ≥3 solutions (e.g., demand forecasting model, resource allocation optimization, process efficiency plan) applicable to inventory management and production planning problems using statistical (mean, standard deviation) and optimization (linear programming) concepts in a 2-week project-based assessment. They will achieve "Excellent" ratings in ≥4 out of 5 rubric items (problem definition, methodology, feasibility, result analysis, presentation).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
